item.title: OctoPrint On Air #35
item.description: The thirty-fifth episode of a monthly live broadcast for Patrons which aired live on October 30th 2020.

item.title: OctoPrint On Air #34
item.description: The thirty-fourth episode of a monthly live broadcast for Patrons which aired live on September 18th 2020.

item.title: Upgrade your OctoPrint install to Python 3!
item.description: Give OctoPrint a spin on Python 3! Run this simple install script.

item.title: Automating OctoPrint's release tests
item.description: OctoPrint's release tests so far involved a lot of card juggling and other manual steps with a lot of wasted time. Read how I was finally able to automate this after a long journey.

item.title: OctoPrint On Air #33
item.description: The thirty-third episode of a monthly live broadcast for Patrons which aired live on July 24th 2020.

item.title: OctoPrint On Air #32
item.description: The thirty second episode of a monthly live broadcast for Patrons which aired live on June 19th 2020.

item.title: OctoPrint On Air #31
item.description: The thirtyfirst episode of a monthly live broadcast for Patrons which aired live on May 8th 2020.

item.title: Official Discord server launched!
item.description: OctoPrint now has an official Discord server, find the invite at discord.octoprint.org!

item.title: Help to fight the Corona Crisis using your 3D printer
item.description: A guest post by Oliver Dathe on how you can help in the fight against the ongoing SARS-CoV-2 pandemic. If you have any printing capacities free, please consider joining the community effort!

item.title: Announcement: OctoPrint On Air #30 LIVE
item.description: On Friday, March 27th at 17:00 CET the next OctoPrint On Air episode will air live - this time for everyone, as a chance to virtually get together as a community in these troubling times!
